projects.title: Sales and Inventory System
projects.description: I'm doing this project for a local grocery store in the community where I live. To do it, use the MVC with php, connection to a SQL database, Bootstrap for the design and implement Jqery for a specific functionality at the request of the client. Currently it is still in development, but as soon as it is ready I'll publish a copy on the internet

projects.title: Professional Portfolio
projects.description: As a digital professional, a space on the web where I show the world my work is vital. To give a great user impression the Jamstack with React and Gatsby using the 'gatsby-starter-portfolio-minimal-theme' theme

projects.title: First Personal Blog For College
projects.description: Last term I was assigned the task of creating a personal blog for the university. It was the first time I was introduced to JamStack and the first tool I tried was Eleventy.js. I implemented it with .njk files and with html, css and vanilla javascript.

projects.title: Restaurant Landing Page
projects.description: TThis was a landing page design where I just used css grid to put together a responsive layout for the whole page.
